summary: This is an email exchange from August 10, 2019, regarding a discrepancy in a count, specifically questioning why a count changed from 73 to 72 between midnight and 3 AM. The email includes an attachment of 'Count Slips' and appears to be a request for information or clarification.

persons.name: Venzon
persons.context: Appears as the sender of an email questioning a count discrepancy, sent from a Samsung Galaxy smartphone.

events.title: Email Inquiry About Count Discrepancy
events.description: An email was sent questioning why a count changed from 73 to 72 between 12 AM and 3 AM, with 'Count Slips' attached.

keyFacts: An email dated August 10, 2019, questions a discrepancy where a count changed from 73 to 72 between 12 AM and 3 AM.
The email sender is 'Venzon' and was sent from a Samsung Galaxy smartphone.
The email includes an attachment described as 'Count Slips', which was requested information.
